title: How much should I pay a friend for being my trustee?
question: I live in the San Francisco Bay Area.
answers:
Hello,

Please note that professional fiduciaries get paid anywhere from $125 - $150 an hour. If you have no experience in this area, you may want to consider $$80-$100 hour.
A trustee is usually paid after they have done something and then only after the Probate court has approved their fee request.
The standard is 1% but you can pay whatever you deem fair. An hourly rate, a flat rate, whatever you would like, just make sure it is clear in the document.
Trustees usually get compensated only after they apply to the court for permission to be compensated.
